text: Carlo Maria Rosini (7 April 1748, in Naples – 18 February 1836, in Naples) was a Roman Catholic priest, bishop and philologist. Pope Pius VI made him Bishop of Pozzuoli on 21 December 1797.http://www.catholic- hierarchy.org/bishop/brosini.html ==References== ==External links== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:Bishops of Pozzuoli Category:People from Naples Category:1748 births Category:1836 deaths Category:Philologists
title: Carlo Rosini
